component.name: EVE Preview Manager
component.summary: Utility for EVE Online multiboxing with real-time thumbnail previews and customizable hotkeys

description.p: EVE Preview Manager is a lightweight utility designed to enhance the EVE Online multi-boxing experience.

ul.li: Live Previews: Real-time thumbnails of all running clients.
Rapid Switching: Robust hotkey support to instantly switch focus between clients.
Customization: Configurable font, borders, colors, size, opacity, and more
Profiles: Save and load multiple configurations on the fly for different setups

description.p: NOTE: This application is not affiliated with CCP Games.

ul.li: Static Mode: A new per-character override that allows you to use a solid color for the thumbnail background instead of a live preview.
Added a setting to disable/enable the "MINIMIZED" overlay text when using the "Minimize EVE clients when switching focus" feature.
Fixed a bug where inactive client borders were not rendered until the client was focused at least once before.
Updated AppStream metainfo for Flathub submission
Preparations for Flathub and Arch AUR submissions
Tabbed GUI: Rearranged the GUI to use a tabbed structure for settings components.
Inactive Client Borders: Customizable border color and thickness for inactive clients.
Aliases: Create custom names (e.g., "Main", "Super") for previews.
Visual Overrides: Configure border color, text color, and size on a per-character basis.
Load Profile Hotkey: Instantly load a specific profile via hotkey.
Temporary Cycle Skip: Hotkey to temporarily skip a character in the cycle group (resets on refresh/swap).
Flexible Character Hotkeys: Per-character hotkeys now work even if not in the cycle group.
Enforced XWayland: The app now enforces X11/XWayland mode to ensure reliable hotkeys without the user being in the input group.
